sense.gloss: working one's way through school, earning one's own school fees
studying under adversity, studying in harsh economic circumstances

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は|↑苦学|↑↓くがく↓して↑大学↑↓だいがく↓を↑卒業↑↓そつぎょう↓した。
sdata.e: I worked my way through college.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は|↑苦学|↑↓くがく↓して↑曲↑↓ま↓がりなりにも↑大学↑↓だいがく↓を↑出↑↓で↓た。
sdata.e: Somehow he managed to work his way through college.

sdata.j: あおいは、|↑苦学|↑↓くがく↓↑生↑↓せい↓だから、そんな↑高級↑↓こうきゅう↓なもの、↑持↑↓も↓てないです。
sdata.e: I'm a self-supporting student so I can't have that sort of high class thing.

sdata.j: バイトで↑学費↑↓がくひ↓を↑稼↑↓かせ↓ぎながら↑大学↑↓だいがく↓に↑通↑↓かよ↓ってる。まあ|↑苦学|↑↓くがく↓↑生↑↓せい↓ってとこかな。
sdata.e: I pay my university fees to go to university by part-time work. Well, I'm a 'working student' I suppose.

sdata.j: あおいは、|↑苦学|↑↓くがく↓↑生↑↓せい↓だから、そんな↑高級↑↓こうきゅう↓なもの、↑持↑↓も↓てないです。
sdata.e: I'm putting myself through school, so I can't have things that are that expensive.
